hopobject.name: WiRe
hopobject.body:
The WiRe project seeks to provide android smartphones with universal Infrared (IR) television remote control functionality.

The limitations/scope of this project include:

1. Android application will be restricted to a minimum Android Operating Sytem of Android 4.2.2

2. Data communications will be conducted over a Wi-Fi network

3. The embedded device will be built utilizing the Beaglebone Black as its core

4. The Final product will be capable of conducting common television controls
